slide.title: XML-RPC
slide.blurb: XML-RPC is the predecessor to SOAP, created by Dave Winer of UserLand Software (now Harvard) and Don Box of DevelopMentor (now Microsoft).
From a semantical point of view, SOAP is simpler.
But XML-RPC is very simple to implement, simple to understand and simple to use.
It describes the method, not the data.
